sample_3 module

exception sample_3.SpiceSelectionError

Bases: Exception

Exception raised when an invalid category is provided.

sample_3.select_spices(category=None)

Return a list of randomly selected spices.

Parameters:

category (list[str] or None) – Optional category of spices.

Raises:

SpiceSelectionError – If the category is invalid.

Returns:

A list of selected spices.

Return type:

list[str]

sample_3.weighted_average(values, weights)

Compute the weighted average of a list of values.

Parameters:

  • values (list[int, float]) – A list of numerical values.

  • weights (list[int, float]) – A list of weights corresponding to each value.

Raises:

ValueError – If the lists have different lengths or contain invalid elements.

Returns:

The weighted average of the values.

Return type:

float

Example:
>>> weighted_average([3, 5, 7], [0.2, 0.3, 0.5])
5.2
